ModMetaData.name: Marine Corps Traits (1.0)
ModMetaData.author: Ranik2k, Patrick McAuliffe
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in traits that more or less make the people who have them badasses. This mod is compatible with anything that does not modify the traits files.
Credit to Patrick McAuliffe for the original MarineCorpsTraits mod for 0.16.
